verses.text: \w When|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w had|strong="G2424"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w*, \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w went|strong="G1831"\w* \w forth|strong="G1831"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w over|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* brook Cedron, \w where|strong="G3699"\w* \w there|strong="G1510"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w a|strong="G1510"\w* \w garden|strong="G2779"\w*, \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w entered|strong="G1525"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*.

\w Judas|strong="G2455"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w having|strong="G3767"\w* \w received|strong="G2983"\w* \w a|strong="G2983"\w* band \w of|strong="G1537"\w* soldiers \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w servants|strong="G5257"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w chief|strong="G0749"\w* \w priests|strong="G0749"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w*, cometh thither \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w lanterns|strong="G5322"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w torches|strong="G2985"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w weapons|strong="G3696"\w*.

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w*, \w knowing|strong="G1492"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \w that|strong="G3004"\w* \w should|strong="G2212"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w went|strong="G1831"\w* \w forth|strong="G1831"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*: \w Whom|strong="G5101"\w* \w seek|strong="G2212"\w* ye?

\w They|strong="G0846"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w of|strong="G3004"\w* \w Nazareth|strong="G3480"\w*. \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* saith \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*: \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Judas|strong="G2455"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w betrayed|strong="G3860"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w stood|strong="G2476"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w As|strong="G5613"\w* soon \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w had|strong="G1510"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*: \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w*; \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w went|strong="G0565"\w* backward, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w fell|strong="G4098"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w ground|strong="G5476"\w*.

\w Again|strong="G3825"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w asked|strong="G1905"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*: \w Whom|strong="G5101"\w* \w seek|strong="G2212"\w* ye? \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w of|strong="G3004"\w* \w Nazareth|strong="G3480"\w*.

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w*, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w have|strong="G1510"\w* \w told|strong="G3004"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w he|strong="G3778"\w*. \w If|strong="G1487"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w seek|strong="G2212"\w* \w me|strong="G3004"\w*, \w let|strong="G0863"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w go|strong="G5217"\w* \w their|strong="G0863"\w* \w way|strong="G5217"\w*.

\w That|strong="G3754"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w word|strong="G3056"\w* \w might|strong="G1473"\w* \w be|strong="G3056"\w* \w fulfilled|strong="G4137"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*: \w Of|strong="G1537"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* thou hast \w given|strong="G1325"\w* \w me|strong="G1325"\w*, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w have|strong="G3748"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w lost|strong="G0622"\w* \w any|strong="G3762"\w* \w one|strong="G3762"\w*.

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w*: \w Put|strong="G0906"\w* \w up|strong="G1519"\w* thy \w sword|strong="G3162"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* scabbard. \w The|strong="G3588"\w* chalice \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w my|strong="G0906"\w* \w Father|strong="G3962"\w* hath \w given|strong="G1325"\w* \w me|strong="G1325"\w*, \w shall|strong="G3162"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w drink|strong="G4095"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w*?

\w Then|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* band \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* tribune, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w servants|strong="G5257"\w* \w of|strong="G2424"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*, took \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w bound|strong="G1210"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G3739"\w* \w led|strong="G0071"\w* \w him|strong="G3739"\w* \w away|strong="G0071"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w Annas|strong="G0452"\w* \w first|strong="G4413"\w*, \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* father \w in|strong="G2532"\w* law \w to|strong="G4314"\w* Caiphas, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w high|strong="G0749"\w* \w priest|strong="G0749"\w* \w of|strong="G4413"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w year|strong="G1763"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* Caiphas \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w he|strong="G3754"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w had|strong="G1510"\w* given \w the|strong="G3588"\w* counsel \w to|strong="G0444"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*: \w That|strong="G3754"\w* \w it|strong="G1161"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* expedient \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w* should \w die|strong="G0599"\w* \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w people|strong="G2992"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Simon|strong="G4613"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w followed|strong="G0190"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w so|strong="G2532"\w* \w did|strong="G1510"\w* \w another|strong="G0243"\w* \w disciple|strong="G3101"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G1565"\w* \w disciple|strong="G3101"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w known|strong="G1110"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w high|strong="G0749"\w* \w priest|strong="G0749"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* went \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w with|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w court|strong="G0833"\w* \w of|strong="G3101"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w high|strong="G0749"\w* \w priest|strong="G0749"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w stood|strong="G2476"\w* \w at|strong="G4314"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w door|strong="G2374"\w* \w without|strong="G2532"\w*. \w The|strong="G3588"\w* \w other|strong="G0243"\w* \w disciple|strong="G3101"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w was|strong="G4074"\w* \w known|strong="G1110"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w high|strong="G0749"\w* \w priest|strong="G0749"\w*, \w went|strong="G1831"\w* \w out|strong="G1831"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w spoke|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* portress, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w brought|strong="G1521"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w*.

\w The|strong="G3588"\w* maid \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w that|strong="G1565"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* portress, saith \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w*: Art \w not|strong="G3756"\w* thou \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w one|strong="G3778"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w man’s|strong="G0444"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*? \w He|strong="G2532"\w* saith: \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w servants|strong="G1401"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* ministers \w stood|strong="G2476"\w* \w at|strong="G1161"\w* \w a|strong="G1510"\w* \w fire|strong="G0439"\w* \w of|strong="G1401"\w* coals, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w cold|strong="G5592"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w warmed|strong="G2328"\w* \w themselves|strong="G0846"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w*, \w standing|strong="G2476"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w warming|strong="G2328"\w* \w himself|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w The|strong="G3588"\w* \w high|strong="G0749"\w* \w priest|strong="G0749"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w asked|strong="G2065"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* doctrine.

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w spoken|strong="G2980"\w* \w openly|strong="G3954"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w world|strong="G2889"\w*: \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w always|strong="G3842"\w* \w taught|strong="G1321"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w synagogue|strong="G4864"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w temple|strong="G2413"\w*, whither \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* resort; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w secret|strong="G2927"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w spoken|strong="G2980"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3762"\w*.

\w Why|strong="G5101"\w* asketh thou \w me|strong="G3004"\w*? \w ask|strong="G2065"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w have|strong="G1473"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w have|strong="G1473"\w* \w spoken|strong="G2980"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*: \w behold|strong="G2396"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w have|strong="G1473"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w had|strong="G2424"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w*, \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w of|strong="G1520"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w servants|strong="G5257"\w* \w standing|strong="G3936"\w* \w by|strong="G3004"\w*, \w gave|strong="G1325"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w a|strong="G1325"\w* blow, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*: Answerest thou \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w high|strong="G0749"\w* \w priest|strong="G0749"\w* \w so|strong="G3779"\w*?

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w If|strong="G1487"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w have|strong="G1473"\w* \w spoken|strong="G2980"\w* \w evil|strong="G2556"\w*, give \w testimony|strong="G3140"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w evil|strong="G2556"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w well|strong="G2573"\w*, \w why|strong="G5101"\w* strikest thou \w me|strong="G1473"\w*?

\w And|strong="G0749"\w* \w Annas|strong="G0452"\w* \w sent|strong="G0649"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w bound|strong="G1210"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* Caiphas \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w high|strong="G0749"\w* \w priest|strong="G0749"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Simon|strong="G4613"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w standing|strong="G2476"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w warming|strong="G2328"\w* \w himself|strong="G0846"\w*. \w They|strong="G0846"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: Art \w not|strong="G3756"\w* thou \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w one|strong="G3588"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*? \w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w denied|strong="G0720"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*: \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*.

\w One|strong="G1520"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w servants|strong="G1401"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w high|strong="G0749"\w* \w priest|strong="G0749"\w* (\w a|strong="G1510"\w* kinsman \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w whose|strong="G3739"\w* \w ear|strong="G5621"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w cut|strong="G0609"\w* \w off|strong="G0609"\w*) saith \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w Did|strong="G1510"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w see|strong="G3708"\w* thee \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w garden|strong="G2779"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*?

\w Again|strong="G3825"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w denied|strong="G0720"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w immediately|strong="G2112"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* cock crew.

\w Then|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w led|strong="G0071"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* Caiphas \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* governor’s hall. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w morning|strong="G4404"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w went|strong="G1525"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* hall, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w might|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w defiled|strong="G3392"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w might|strong="G2532"\w* \w eat|strong="G2068"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* pasch.

\w Pilate|strong="G4091"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w went|strong="G1831"\w* \w out|strong="G1831"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G5346"\w*: \w What|strong="G5101"\w* \w accusation|strong="G2724"\w* \w bring|strong="G5342"\w* \w you|strong="G2532"\w* \w against|strong="G2596"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w*?
